import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Badge, Button, Group } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta<typeof Card> = {
  title: 'Generated/Card',
  id: 'card-9f7dfc6f',
  component: Card,
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 340 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/340/160?random=1"
          height={160}
          alt="Card image"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Group justify="space-between" mt="md" mb="xs">
        <Text fw={500}>Norway Fjord Adventures</Text>
        <Badge color="pink" variant="light">
          On Sale
        </Badge>
      </Group>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
        With Fjord Tours you can explore more of the magical fjord landscapes with tours and
        activities on and around the fjords of Norway
      </Text>

      <Button color="blue" fullWidth mt="md" radius="md">
        Book classic tour now
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const SimpleCard: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 300 }}>
      <Text fw={500} size="lg" mb="xs">
        Simple Card
      </Text>
      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
        This is a simple card component with just text content and no images.
      </Text>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithoutBorder: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="md" padding="xl" radius="lg" style={{ width: 340 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/340/180?random=2"
          height={180}
          alt="Nature landscape"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Text fw={600} size="xl" mt="md">
        Beautiful Landscapes
      </Text>

      <Text size="sm" mt="sm">
        Explore breathtaking views and stunning natural wonders from around the world.
      </Text>

      <Group mt="md">
        <Button variant="filled" color="blue">
          Explore
        </Button>
        <Button variant="outline" color="blue">
          Learn More
        </Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const MultipleSections: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 360 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/360/200?random=3"
          height={200}
          alt="Product showcase"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <CardSection p="lg">
        <Group justify="space-between" mb="xs">
          <Text fw={500} size="lg">
            Premium Product
          </Text>
          <Badge color="green" variant="filled">
            New
          </Badge>
        </Group>

        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mb="md">
          High-quality product with excellent features and outstanding performance.
        </Text>

        <Group>
          <Badge variant="light" color="blue">
            Feature 1
          </Badge>
          <Badge variant="light" color="blue">
            Feature 2
          </Badge>
          <Badge variant="light" color="blue">
            Feature 3
          </Badge>
        </Group>
      </CardSection>

      <CardSection p="lg">
        <Group justify="space-between">
          <Text size="xl" fw={700}>
            $299.99
          </Text>
          <Button color="blue" radius="md">
            Add to Cart
          </Button>
        </Group>
      </CardSection>
    </Card>
  ),
};
